sentences.english: Needless to say, the British made no attempt to introduce anti-racist legislation.
sentences.chinese: 不用說，英國人是懶得在香港對反種族主義立法的。

sentences.english: For his part Morrissey has always denied any racist tendencies.
sentences.chinese: 莫里西總是否認自己有任何種族主義的傾向。

sentences.english: As the face of America has changed, so has the face of American racism.
sentences.chinese: 隨着美國的面貌改變，美國種族主義也改頭換面了。

sentences.english: American abhorrence of Japanese military culture was hardly standard racism.
sentences.chinese: 美國對日本軍國主義的厭惡不能算進種族主義範疇。

sentences.english: Then of course there are the sort of ethnic-based militias.
sentences.chinese: 當然，肯定存在一些種族主義上的民兵。

sentences.english: Some whites see this new mood as racism in reverse.
sentences.chinese: 相反，有些白人把這種新情緒看成是種族主義。

sentences.english: He's a racist and an anti - Semite and a prick.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個種族主義和反猶份子和刺痛。

sentences.english: Racial slurs, racial jokes, all having to do with being Asian.
sentences.chinese: 種族主義辱罵，種族笑話，都是跟亞裔有關的。

sentences.english: You sound like you have ethnocentric tendencies .
sentences.chinese: 聽起來你一樣有種族主義的傾向。

sentences.english: In what bizarro world is gun control racist?
sentences.chinese: 槍支管制究竟帶有什麼樣的種族主義色彩呢？

sentences.english: To ignore racism or deny its existence is to allow it to continue.
sentences.chinese: 忽視或者否認種族主義的存在就是允許歧視繼續發生。

sentences.english: Racism and any other forms of discrimination will never be tolerated.
sentences.chinese: 我們絕不容忍種族主義和任何其他形式的歧視。

sentences.english: Therefore it was a pro-slavery racist organization.
sentences.chinese: 它是一個親奴隸制的種族主義組織。

sentences.english: The ANC has spent half a century fighting against racialism.
sentences.chinese: 非洲人國民大會與種族主義進行了半個世紀的鬥爭。

sentences.english: The higher education of Black American people, from its emergence to development, has never been independent from the racialism.
sentences.chinese: 美國黑人高等教育的產生和發展與種族主義密切相關。
